name: Totally Realistic Sledding VR Demo
description:
Totally Realistic Sledding VR is an over-the-top and supposedly humorous sledding simulator. No, its not another head tilt game. You actually have to move your arms this time.

Currently this version is only a demo. A taste of whats to come. Though its kind of outdated, it features the first level in its prototype state. We're slowly working towards a full version with plenty of content and replayability. An Early Access version of the game can be found on Steam. We hope you will support us if you enjoyed this demo. 

Remember to read the controls below or you will struggle like many others before who didn't.

Here is a trailer of the Early Access version:

Discord: https://discord.gg/nDQsaCD Email: blackjack27304@gmail.com Controls:
  1. Pull the controllers like handle bars(not a driving wheel) to rotate your sled. No need to press any buttons.
  2.  Avoid obstacles and get on ramps and speed boosts. 
  3. Pull both controllers up quickly to jump.
  4. Go as fast as possible.
  5. Press R to restart the level, or M to go back to menu.
